verbs.description: [ARG0: soundcore] [ARGM-MNR: by] anker [V: announces] [ARG1: the flare s its first bluetooth speaker with alexa built - in soundcore a subbrand of anker has announced the expansion of its flare series of bluetooth speakers with the flare s which now has amazon alexa built - in amazon anker soundcore alexa internet]
